data.title: Online Bachelor's in Human Resource Management
data.meta_description: Bachelor's degree in human resources from American Military University will prepare you to help an organization recruit and retain a quality workforce.
data.text:
About This Program

The BA in Human Resource Management from American Military University (AMU) prepares you to help an organization recruit and retain a quality workforce.

AMU’s bachelor of human resource management explores these essential topics related to talent acquisition and retention:

Motivation

Compensation, including benefits and incentives

Evaluation

Development

Diversity and inclusivity are also addressed as part of this online bachelor’s degree in human resources. Additionally, you will learn about laws, rules, regulations, and policies impacting HR management. You will become familiar with the role HR plays toward helping an organization define its strategic direction.

The program is aligned with Society of Human Resource Management (SHRM) HR Curriculum Guidelines. If eligible, you may apply to take the SHRM Certified Professional exam in your final year of the program.
